page.title: 12Life on an Eastchurch Farm
page.content: My{home life}is on Connetts{farm with my parents, an older sister and a younger brother. I live some distance from other children in Eastchurch {village. I help my dad at weekends with feeding the cows and looking after the crops. In one field, next to the caravan park, people climb over and break the wire on the fence. I help to tie this up but it has to be done frequently as these people return, sometimes with wire cutters. Recently a Jack Russell Terrier got in among our{sheep}and two days later we found a dead lamb. During the lambing season, if I get up early enough, I help feed the sheep and lambs. The snows of 1985 made it hard for us and we lost five lambs.
